author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
How far has E Ink technology come since the early days E-readers almost 20 years ago? We take a look at the reMarkable Paper Pro Move, which uses E Ink's latest Gallery 3 display to let you take notes and annotate in full color. Let's see how this mini tablet performs as an alternative to sketching and notetaking on paper, and where E Ink excels over backlit screens. 

reMarkable Paper Pro Move: https://remarkable.com/products/remarkable-paper/pro-move
Disclosure: This product was sent to us by the manufacturer for purposes of review and is not sponsored. 

Shot and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

title: This E-Ink Tablet Wants to Replace Your Notepad
